level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: * ยง 21-502 Applicability. This chapter shall apply to all sponsoring agencies and WEP participants. * NB The validity of local law 13 of 2000 is currently a subject of disagreement between the Mayor and the City Council. This certification is not intended as a legal opinion as to the validity of the local law, other than certifying the truth of the facts presented herein.
